input_text:
Job Title: Technical Lead

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company:At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams. We know finding the right talents and teams is a major challenge in today’s skills market. That’s why we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs.
Through this platform, employers can efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams anywhere in the world. While reducing costs significantly.
As the world of tech work increasingly embraces a remote-first approach, we’re dedicated to redefining employer-employee working relationships. Our mission is to empower employees with better pay, the opportunity to build world-changing tech solutions, increased work flexibility, and a promising career path.
Website:http://www.codemonk.ai
Skills: Java, C#, Python, JavaScript, Microservices, SOA, AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Agile, Scrum, DevOps
Key Responsibilities:• Lead the design and development of scalable, robust, and secure software solutions.• Define technical architectures, frameworks, and strategies to meet business requirements.• Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.• Mentor and guide development teams, providing architectural guidance and support.• Conduct technical reviews, identify risks, and propose mitigation strategies.• Define and enforce coding standards, best practices, and architectural patterns.• Evaluate new technologies and tools, and make recommendations for adoption.• Ensure alignment with industry standards, security protocols, and regulatory compliance• Proficiency in software development languages such as Java, C#, Python, or JavaScript.• Strong understanding of architectural principles and patterns like microservices, SOA, and event-driven architecture.• Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.• Knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.• Familiarity with modern development methodologies like Agile, Scrum, or DevOps.• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with attention to detail.• Ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.• Professional experience in software development, with at least 5 years in an architect role.

Why we think you'll love working with us:We are early stage and already a profitable venture.You will be part of the journey we’re on, so we offer equity options for important roles along with competitive salary.It will be an exciting stage to join as we are looking to raise our first substantial round this year.Beyond this, there’s plenty more that makes us a great place to work:We are fully remote company with flexible workingWe do not follow 9-5 and work when we are at our best30 days Paid Time OffRegular remote socials with global teamsRegular bounties and other campaigns for you to winPlus more rewards as we grow

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Technical Lead
output_json.summary: Lead the design and development of scalable, robust, and secure software solutions.
soft_skills: Ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders
job_responsibilities: Lead the design and development of scalable, robust, and secure software solutions.
Define technical architectures, frameworks, and strategies to meet business requirements.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.
Mentor and guide development teams, providing architectural guidance and support.
Conduct technical reviews, identify risks, and propose mitigation strategies.
Define and enforce coding standards, best practices, and architectural patterns.
Evaluate new technologies and tools, and make recommendations for adoption.
Ensure alignment with industry standards, security protocols, and regulatory compliance.
benefits: Regular remote socials with global teams
Regular bounties and other campaigns for you to win
Additional rewards as the company grows
output_json.company_information: CodeMonk is a fully remote company offering a gateway for companies to access global tech talents and teams.
